data.text: @BloombergAsia Stop madness!! Peace talk 🇨🇳🇩🇪🇪🇺🇫🇷🇬🇧🇮🇳🇮🇱🇮🇷🇷🇺🇸🇦🇸🇾🇹🇷🇺🇲. Free 🌍 Ukraine and Syrië make world peace. Protect the weak save childeren build homes save nature protect animals fight climat change explore cosmos be happy ❤ human forgive accept there good/bad. Past is gone united future

@BloombergAsia Just always “leaking” plans through pro-Beijing media, but no official announcement. That’s Hong Kong government creating panic among the people. People are right to get themselves well prepared upon such chaotic governance.
@BloombergAsia Covid #s never came out of China, but now they are making a big issue and locking towns especially in HongKong.. Want to prevent Protests probably?
